# Summary
Senior Developer Advocate with 7+ years building technical communities and creating educational content. Expert in AI agents, cloud-native technologies, and open source. Built developer communities from 0 to 100K+ members. Created technical content reaching 5M+ developers. Conference speaker at 30+ events including KubeCon, AWS re:Invent, and PyCon.

# Work Experience
## **Senior Developer Advocate, AI & Machine Learning**, Amazon Web Services (AWS) -- Austin, TX

Jan 2022 – present

- Lead developer advocacy for AWS AI services including Bedrock, SageMaker, and AI agents

- Built Strands Agents community to 5K developers through workshops, content, and office hours

- Delivered keynote at AWS re:Invent 2024 to audience of 2K+ attendees

- Created 100+ technical tutorials, sample apps, and demos driving 500K+ views

- Hosted weekly livestream on Twitch with 10K+ regular viewers discussing AI agent development

- Launched AI Agents workshop series attended by 2K+ developers across 15 cities

- Contributed to product roadmap based on 500+ developer feedback sessions

- Grew AWS AI GitHub org from 1K to 15K stars through community engagement



## **Developer Advocate, Kubernetes & Cloud Native**, Google Cloud -- San Francisco, CA

Mar 2019 – Dec 2021

- Led developer advocacy for Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) and Cloud Run

- Created GKE tutorial series with 1M+ views on YouTube

- Spoke at KubeCon (3x), CNCF events (5x), and 20+ regional conferences

- Built Kubernetes office hours program serving 500+ developers monthly

- Contributed to Kubernetes documentation improving onboarding experience

- Partnered with product team to launch GKE Autopilot based on developer feedback

- Authored O'Reilly book chapter on Kubernetes best practices (50K+ downloads)



## **Cloud Developer Advocate**, Microsoft -- Seattle, WA

June 2017 – Feb 2019

- Focused on Azure Functions, serverless, and developer tools

- Created Azure Functions workshop delivered to 1K+ developers at conferences

- Built VS Code extension tutorial series with 500K+ views

# Content and Community
**YouTube Channel:** PriyaCodesTech channel with 50K subscribers and 2M total views. Weekly videos on cloud, AI, and developer tools. 150+ technical tutorials and live coding sessions.

**Blog & Writing:** Personal blog with 500K+ annual views. Published 200+ technical articles. Guest author for CSS-Tricks, Smashing Magazine, Dev.to (100K+ followers)

**Podcast:** Co-host of Cloud Native Chats podcast (10K+ downloads per episode). 50+ episodes interviewing industry leaders from Kubernetes, CNCF, and cloud providers.

**Open Source:** Maintainer of 3 popular OSS projects: k8s-deploy-helper (5K stars), serverless-toolkit (3K stars), cloud-native-tutorials (2K stars). 200+ contributions to Kubernetes, Prometheus, and Knative.

**Conference Speaking:** Delivered 80+ talks at conferences and meetups. Keynote speaker at KubeCon Europe 2023, AWS Community Day (3x), PyCon (2x). Regular speaker at local meetups in Austin, SF, and Seattle.

**Community Building:** Founded Austin Cloud Native Meetup (2K members). Co-organizer of DevRel Summit Austin. Mentor in GitHub Education program supporting 20+ students.
